summary: Photography and videography website for 'Sumit Photo and Videography' with cinematic wedding theme, including public galleries (Videos & Special Moments), customer booking system with package selection, and admin panel for managing orders, content, and packages
architectural_notes: Cinematic wedding theme with clean, elegant design aesthetic
Public-facing site requires no authentication for browsing and booking
Admin panel protected by Internet Identity authentication
Content organization system with categories (Weddings, Pre-wedding, Receptions)
Featured content system for homepage highlights
Date-based organization system for Special Moments galleries in addition to category-based organization
Universal admin editing capabilities for all site content including homepage, packages, and galleries
Centralized admin dashboard with unified navigation for all management features
Backend admin principal registry for access control
Role-based access with full admin privileges for all authenticated admins

existing_features.title: Create a cinematic wedding-themed homepage with hero section showcasing featured photography and videography work
Implement Videos gallery page that displays videography portfolio with category organization (Weddings, Pre-wedding, Receptions)
Implement Special Moments gallery page that displays photography portfolio with category organization (Weddings, Pre-wedding, Receptions)
Create Orders/Booking section where customers can browse photography packages and submit booking requests with package selection and date
Implement admin panel order management with ability to view all booking requests, approve/reject bookings, update booking status (pending/confirmed/completed), and assign photographers to bookings
Implement admin panel content management for uploading and organizing videos and photos with category assignment (Weddings, Pre-wedding, Receptions) and featured content control
Implement admin panel package management for creating and editing photography/videography packages with names, descriptions, and prices
Implement Internet Identity authentication to secure admin panel access while keeping public pages accessible without login

Apply a cohesive cinematic wedding photography visual theme with elegant typography, soft romantic colors (rose gold, champagne, ivory tones), and sophisticated layout patterns throughout the entire application
Update the hero section background image to feature a wedding photography themed visual that emphasizes the cinematic wedding aesthetic
Refresh the color palette throughout the application to enhance the wedding photography aesthetic while maintaining the existing rose gold, champagne, and ivory tones foundation
Add wedding and photography themed background imagery to key sections throughout the site including the homepage services section and gallery pages
Render all generated wedding photography themed images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory

Create admin interface for managing date-organized Special Moments galleries with form to create new galleries by date, input fields for title and description, ability to upload multiple photos to each gallery, and list view of all existing date-organized galleries with edit and delete actions

Update Special Moments public gallery page to display both category-organized photos and date-organized galleries with filter toggle between 'By Category' and 'By Date' views, showing date-organized galleries as clickable cards that open full gallery views
Create admin interface for editing homepage hero section content with form fields for title, subtitle, call-to-action button text, and image upload for hero background with live preview
Update HomePage component to fetch and display dynamic hero section content from backend instead of using hardcoded values
Enhance existing package management system to allow editing all package fields including name, description, price, and type through the admin panel PackageForm component
Create admin interface for managing gallery categories with form to edit category display names and descriptions for Weddings, Pre-Wedding, and Receptions categories
Create admin interface for editing site-wide text content with dedicated form sections for services descriptions (photography and videography), booking page introduction text, and footer content
Update HomePage services section and BookingPage to fetch and display dynamic text content from backend instead of using hardcoded descriptions

Create unified admin dashboard page component at frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardPage.tsx with organized navigation menu that provides links to all existing admin features: Order Management, Content Management (Videos/Photos/Date Galleries), Package Management, Homepage Content, Category Management, and Sitewide Content

Update App.tsx routing configuration to add the unified admin dashboard as the main admin route at /admin, with the dashboard serving as the landing page for authenticated admins and providing navigation to all sub-admin pages

Update AdminGuard component to use the new backend admin check method, verifying that authenticated users are in the admin list before granting access to admin routes, and showing appropriate access denied messages for non-admin authenticated users
Update Layout component header navigation to show an 'Admin Dashboard' link when the current user is verified as an admin, providing quick access to the unified admin dashboard from any page
